page.title: 18WELBURY SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: I get up at 7.15 and see my dad off to work before having my breakfast. He is a Personnel Officer at I.C.I.Wilton about 20 miles away.My mum gets breakfast ready and at 8.15 my brother and I catch the school bus to the Allertonshire School in Northallerton. It is a large comprehensive school wih about 1,000 pupils.Lunch is self-service in the school dining hall.At 4.p.m. I return home on the school bus, do my homework and we have our evening meal when dad comes home from work.During the summer months I go out to play in the evenings, we play games such as hide & seek, fifties up or go on bike rides. Wednesday night it is swimming club at Northallerton,Thursday tennis club and Friday Guides both held at Appleton Wiske.In the Winter Evenings I mainly watch T.V.I usually go to bed at 9p.m.
